HERO.TITLE: Software Developer
HERO.BIO: Developer passionate about creating elegant and performant solutions. Specialist in modern web applications focused on user experience.

DESCRIPTIONS.EXP_1: Technical leadership in developing scalable web applications using Angular and Node.js. Responsible for micro-frontend architecture and DevOps practices implementation.
DESCRIPTIONS.EXP_2: Development of SaaS platform for business management. Full stack with Angular on frontend and Python/FastAPI on backend.
DESCRIPTIONS.EXP_3: Development of websites and web applications for diverse clients. Focus on performance, accessibility and SEO.

HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_1_H1: Reduced build time by 40% with bundling optimizations
HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_1_H2: Implemented CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions

DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_1: Command-line tool in Rust for data analysis and recovery on file systems. Multi-format support optimized for performance.
DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_2: Real-time dashboard for metrics and KPI visualization. Built with Angular and WebSockets for instant updates.
DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_3: API Gateway with rate limiting, caching and JWT authentication. Developed in Node.js focused on high availability.
DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_4: Reusable UI component library with Storybook documentation and automated tests.

DESCRIPTIONS.EDU_1: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with focus on software engineering and distributed systems.
DESCRIPTIONS.EDU_2: Professional certification in Machine Learning and Data Science.
